content_html: In Kerala this year, more than 70 people have been diagnosed and 19 have died from the brain-eating amoeba.

summary: In Kerala this year, more than 70 people have been diagnosed and 19 have died from the brain-eating amoeba.
title: Battling a rare brain-eating disease in an Indian state
